text: Heinz Hoppichler (27 September 1905 – ?)Copy of annual report of Austrian centenarians was an Austrian bobsledder who competed in the early 1950s. At the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo, he finished 16th in the two-man event and did not finish the four-man event. ==References== *1952 bobsleigh two-man results *1952 bobsleigh four-man results * Category:Austrian male bobsledders Category:Olympic bobsledders of Austria Category:Bobsledders at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Year of death missing Category:1905 births
title: Heinz Hoppichler
